backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with extensive content, media, channel, ads, analytics, and metadata types for the platform.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old video content records to a new format by adding the eligibleForLive flag.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the role and behavior of various frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file bootstrapping the React app with root container and main script import.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the full application router with routes for all major pages, wrapped in authentication and layout providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/AnalyticsD: Displays analytics stats and trending content, showing loading skeletons and a grid of metric cards using data from useGetAnalytics.
frontend/src/components/admin/BrandManag: Provides UI for creating, updating, deleting brands and assigning various content types, including file upload and form handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/ChannelMan: Manages live channel creation, editing, and deletion with logo uploads and dialog-based editing.
frontend/src/components/admin/ClipsManag: Handles uploading, editing, and deleting video clips with file uploads, metadata fields, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/admin/LiveSchedu: Allows scheduling programs and managing ad breaks for live channels, with validation and updates via useUpdateLiveChannel.
frontend/src/components/admin/ManualAdsM: Provides UI and logic to upload, assign, and delete ad media and ad assignments using query hooks. Handles file uploads, form state, and CRUD operations for ads.
frontend/src/components/admin/MoviesMana: Manages uploading, updating, and deleting movie video content, including metadata, thumbnails, trailers, and upload progress. Filters movie-type videos and provides edit dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/PodcastsMa: Supports uploading and editing podcast video entries with thumbnails, premium/original flags, and file uploads. Includes editing dialog and update logic.
frontend/src/components/admin/SeriesMana: Handles creation and management of TV series, seasons, and episodes with file uploads and metadata. Provides forms for nested CRUD across series hierarchy.
frontend/src/components/admin/StripeSetu: Displays Stripe configuration status and provides a form to set or update secret keys and allowed countries. Uses query hooks to check and update Stripe setup.
frontend/src/components/admin/VideoManag: Admin interface for uploading, editing, and deleting videos with file handling and metadata fields.
Reusable modal component displaying contextual messages with icons, descriptions, and optional action buttons.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the footer with branded links and opens contextual modals for privacy, terms, and contact info.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the main navigation, search bar, and user menu with authentication-aware actions and responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Displays a featured video with autoplay preview and buttons to play or view more details.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps the app layout with header, footer, routed content, and the profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/live/LiveGuideGr: Renders a scrollable live TV program guide with time slots, channels, and current‑time positioning.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Shows a modal for Internet Identity users to complete their profile by submitting an email.
frontend/src/components/SeriesCard.tsx: Displays a TV series card with thumbnail, metadata, and navigation to the series page.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: Renders a video card with thumbnail, content type badges, and navigation to the watch page.
frontend/src/components/VideoPlayer.tsx: Implements a custom video player with autoplay, ads, preview mode, quality control, and live TV features.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.tsx: Provides authentication state and logic for email/password and Internet Identity, including session restore and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login, stored identities, and AuthClient lifecycle with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating videos, profiles, admin data, and other backend resources using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionStorageStat: Custom hook that syncs React state with sessionStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, light/dark OKLCH theme variables, animations, and custom deep‑red/black scrollbar and background styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Renders the admin panel with permission checking and tabbed management sections for videos, clips, channels, ads, brands, and analytics.
frontend/src/pages/BrandDetailPage.tsx: Loads a brand and its associated films, series, and clips, showing a branded header and content grid with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/ClipsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of all clips with skeleton loading and hover preview effects, linking to the watch page.
frontend/src/pages/EpisodePlayerPage.tsx: Fetches a specific episode and plays it with optional ads based on user status, with navigation back to the series.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds a homepage with featured videos, series, and ads in a rotating slideshow plus listings for main content types.
frontend/src/pages/LivePage.tsx: Displays live channels with auto-selection, program polling, ad handling, and watch/guide modes using several data-fetching hooks.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides email and Internet Identity login and registration forms with validation and redirects after authentication.
frontend/src/pages/MoviesPage.tsx: Fetches all videos, filters movies, and displays them in a grid with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/NetworksPage.tsx: Lists all brands with logos and descriptions and allows navigation to individual brand pages.
frontend/src/pages/OriginalsPage.tsx: Shows original films, series, documentaries, and educational content with tabbed filtering.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment failure message with navigation options to retry or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Verifies Stripe session status, updates user profile, and shows a success screen with navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile page fetching user data, admin status, watch history, and rendering profile info with watched content. Handles redirects and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/SearchResultsPage.tsx: Search results page that triggers a search query, filters results by type, and displays categorized media lists with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/SeriesDetailPage.tsx: Series detail page that fetches a series by ID, shows metadata, hero banner, and season/episode structure with loading and not‑found handling.
frontend/src/pages/TVShowsPage.tsx: Displays all TV series using SeriesCard components with loading skeletons and a fallback message when none exist.
frontend/src/pages/UpgradePage.tsx: Premium upgrade page showing features and handling Stripe checkout; auto‑redirects admins and manages payment initiation state.
frontend/src/pages/VideoPlayerPage.tsx: Video player page that loads a video, checks premium access, assigns ads, and renders a player with metadata and access restrictions.
frontend/src/utils/contentType.ts: Utility functions for mapping content types to labels and determining category groupings like movies and podcasts.
frontend/src/utils/epg.ts: Generates EPG time slots and computes program blocks for channels based on looping schedules and video metadata.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes the project's state, issues, architecture notes, and existing features for a streaming platform with live and VOD content.
